quote: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: My mother had a great deal of trouble with me, but I think she enjoyed it.
name: Mark Twain

quote: My mother's wonderful. To me she's perfection.
name: Michael Jackson

quote: My mom is definitely my rock.
name: Alicia Keys

quote: Men are what their mothers made them.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I think my mom put it best. She said, 'Little girls soften their daddy's hearts.'
name: Paul Walker

quote: I was always at peace because of the way my mom treated me.
name: Martina Hingis

quote: My mom and I have always been there for each other. We had some tough times, but she was always there for me.
name: LeBron James

quote: Motherhood is the greatest thing and the hardest thing.
name: Ricki Lake

quote: My mom always said that there would be haters. Not everyone can love ya.
name: Joel Madden

quote: My mom says I'm a fighter, a fierce competitor, and I think I am, too.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: I want to work, but being a mom is my No. 1 priority.
name: Gena Lee Nolin

quote: I am sure that if the mothers of various nations could meet, there would be no more wars.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: When you're sick, nobody takes care of you like your mom.
name: Trisha Yearwood

quote: I look up to my mom. She's a beautiful woman.
name: Leighton Meester

quote: My mother thinks I am the best. And I was raised to always believe what my mother tells me.
name: Diego Maradona

quote: I'm always awoken with the joyous sound and laughter of my son. That's the best part about being a mom.
name: Jane Krakowski

quote: I have great genes. Thank you to my mom and dad for that one.
name: Gloria Estefan

quote: My mom has beautiful eyes, and I inherited a lot of her rituals, accentuating eyes.
name: Allison Williams

quote: My mother taught me to treat a lady respectfully.
name: Chris Brown

quote: The biggest surprise, which is also the best, is that I didn't know I would love motherhood as much as I do.
name: Deborah Norville

quote: The woman is uniformly sacrificed to the wife and mother.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Sweater, n.: garment worn by child when its mother is feeling chilly.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: My mom used to get arrested for being with my dad. She would get fined. She would spend weekends in jail.
name: Trevor Noah

quote: My mom used to say that I became a fighter and a scrapper and a tough guy to protect who I am at my core.
name: Vin Diesel

quote: An ounce of mother is worth a pound of clergy.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: My mom taught me how to sew when I was 2 or 3, so I've been sewing for as long as I can remember.
name: Serena Williams

quote: A stay-at-home mom is a working mom. Being a stay-at-home mom is a job.
name: Cobie Smulders

quote: My mom was such a strong character. I don't want to say she was like a man, but she was tough.
name: Lance Armstrong

quote: Being a mom has changed me forever.
name: Ciara

quote: I was a single mom that raised two bright, beautiful, and compassionate girls.
name: Connie Stevens

quote: I have great faith that Heaven's there and I'll see my brothers and my mom and dad when I get there.
name: Ernie Harwell

quote: I've learned that every working mom is a superwoman.
name: Uma Thurman

quote: My mom is my best friend and my biggest cheerleader.
name: Scott Eastwood

quote: I feel like a good mom. I'm a strong woman now... Don't look down on me. Pray for me because I'm trying.
name: Fantasia Barrino

quote: The Vatican is against surrogate mothers. Good thing they didn't have that rule when Jesus was born.
name: Elayne Boosler

quote: Mothers are all slightly insane.
name: J. D. Salinger

quote: I'm an adrenaline junkie. I love climbing crazy trees or cliffs, which doesn't make my mom very happy.
name: Stephen Colletti

quote: There was never a child so lovely but his mother was glad to get him to sleep.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
name: Aristotle

quote: I think in a lot of ways unconditional love is a myth. My mom's the only reason I know it's a real thing.
name: Conor Oberst

quote: I may be the only mother in America who knows exactly what their child is up to all the time.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: I'm so happy and thankful I made it a point be a stay-at-home mom.
name: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: My mother used to tell me man gives the award, God gives the reward. I don't need another plaque.
name: Denzel Washington

quote: My mom always taught me to stand up for what I believe in.
name: Adam Rippon

quote: Once you're a mom, always a mom. It's like riding a bike, you never forget.
name: Taraji P. Henson

quote: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
name: Meryl Streep

quote: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Being able to take care of myself is something that my mom really instilled in me.
name: Stevie Nicks

quote: Motherhood is a dream. It really is absolutely amazing.
name: Jessica Simpson

quote: My mom and my dad were both very sociable, meeting lots of interesting people.
name: Bill Gates

quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
name: Tim Allen

quote: My jewelry's all fake - from Claire's. Or I get it from my mom's boutique in Barbados.
name: Rihanna

quote: My mom taught me to live by the three p's: to always be passionate, persistent, and prepared.
name: Hailee Steinfeld

quote: I'd go to, like, six different schools in one year. We were on welfare, and my mom never ever worked.
name: Eminem

quote: My mom worked for Apple, and my dad owned his own business.
name: Travis Scott

quote: I hear my friends and my mom tell me I'm special, but honestly, I still don't get it.
name: LeBron James

quote: Motherhood is the only thing in my life that I've really known for sure is something I wanted to do.
name: Cynthia Nixon

quote: I am blessed to have Mom and Dad.
name: Kevin Eubanks

quote: Me and my mom are just alike in every type of way. I talk to my mom about everything.
name: DeMar DeRozan

quote: I was labeled a troublemaker, my mom an unfit mother, and I was not welcome anywhere.
name: Ryan White

quote: Being the only man in the household with my mom definitely helped me grow up fast.
name: LeBron James

quote: I always wanted what Mom and Dad had.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: When breast cancer took my mom, it met its biggest enemy.
name: DeAngelo Williams

quote: As a mom I know that raising children is the hardest job there is.
name: Hilary Rosen

quote: The person who has inspired me my whole life is my Mom, because she taught me commitment. She sacrificed.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: I had a gorgeous mom. She was beautiful, so I lucked out there.
name: Christie Brinkley

quote: My mom was very strict. She didn't let me watch anything rated R or anything with cussing.
name: Kevin Hart

quote: Yes, Mother. I can see you are flawed. You have not hidden it. That is your greatest gift to me.
name: Alice Walker

quote: Motherhood is priced Of God, at price no man may dare To lessen or misunderstand.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Mom always told us to wear pretty, matching underwear.
name: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: As a busy working mom I'm always pressed for time, so a quick and easy beauty routine is key!
name: Angela Kinsey

quote: Bless my mom. Mom is everything to me.
name: Calvin Johnson

quote: When my first semester grades came out, my mom and dad told me I wouldn't be playing football.
name: Joe Biden

quote: Motherhood is at its best when the tender chords of sympathy have been touched.
name: Paul P. Harris

quote: My mom would still be mad if I didn't say 'please' and 'thank you.'
name: Selena Gomez

quote: Shortly after my dad died, my mom figured that if I could do a few commercials, I'd get a college fund.
name: Liam Aiken

quote: My mom and I had the same vision, and we want the same things. We would always make a goal list every year.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: I've been my mom's kitchen helper since I was a little kid.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: The man in our society is the breadwinner; the woman has enough to do as the homemaker, wife and mother.
name: Dorothy Fields

quote: I didn't plan on being a single mom, but you have to deal with the cards you are dealt the best way you can.
name: Tichina Arnold

quote: My sisters and my mom, those people help me get through every single day.
name: Demi Lovato

quote: Who in their infinite wisdom decreed that Little League uniforms be white? Certainly not a mother.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: My mom never taught me to be waiting for some prince on a white horse to swipe me off my feet.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: I basically became a cheerleader because I had a very strict mom. That was my way of being a bad girl.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: My mom, Irmelin, taught me the value of life. Her own life was saved by my grandmother during World War II.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: Growing up, my ideals were Barbra Streisand, Cher, and my mom.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: My mom and I are very close.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: How simple a thing it seems to me that to know ourselves as we are, we must know our mothers names.
name: Alice Walker

quote: If you would ask my mom what books I liked growing up, I liked Dr. Seuss.
name: will.i.am

quote: Having been raised very disciplined, I had to iron for my mom every Friday afternoon after school.
name: Yolanda Hadid

quote: I like bad boys, and I like to take them home to my mom.
name: Priyanka Chopra

quote: I thank my mom... I thank God for my mom every day because I think if it wasn't for her, who knows?
name: Joanna Krupa

quote: What do girls do who haven't any mothers to help them through their troubles?
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: My dad believes in God, I think. I'm not sure if my mom does. I don't.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: As we all know, there is no harder or more rewarding job than being a mom.
name: Kirsten Gillibrand

quote: I wanted to be a 'jungle mom', where you're giving birth and getting up and doing things straightaway.
name: Grace Jones

quote: There was always an unspoken generosity about my mom.
name: Matt Lauer

quote: My mom modeled and made clothes, so I always had such an appreciation for design.
name: Blake Lively

quote: My mother taught me how to love. My mom is the most loving person I know.
name: Channing Tatum

quote: Every little girl looks up to her mom so much - that's your first hero.
name: Halima Aden

quote: From singing to acting to songwriting to mom to fashion designer! It's been quite an evolution.
name: Christina Milian

quote: My mom raised me to never have anything control me.
name: Chris Tucker

quote: My mom is a hero in a lot of ways because she's the most empathetic and kind person I've ever met.
name: Jake Tapper

quote: I made a clean version of 'Enter the Ninja' that my mom can listen to.
name: Watkin Tudor Jones

quote: My mom used to call me a parrot, because the way I spoke would change in every country we'd go to.
name: Hannah Simone

quote: Giving birth was easier than having a tattoo.
name: Nicole Appleton

quote: I was raised by a single mom. I spent most of my time in daycare.
name: Jon Hamm

quote: My mom literally saved my life. I wasn't supposed to make it out of the orphanage.
name: Oksana Masters

quote: My dad's an architect and my mom owned a French bakery for twelve years.
name: Alison Lohman

quote: My mom told me if I ever got a tattoo, she was going to take it off with a potato peeler.
name: Jacob Dalton

quote: Mothers are the necessity of invention.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: My mom has always been so generous and so sensitive and so vulnerable and yet exudes so much strength.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: My mom, she's a great cook. You know, pirogue, borscht. I love borscht, and I love Pilemeni, meat dumplings.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: My mom got 11 kids. We struggled.
name: Young Thug

quote: My coaches were great. My mom and dad. My dad never missed a wrestling meet.
name: Dan Gable

quote: I was a brownie for a day. My mom made me stop. She didn't want me to conform.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: My mom put me away at 7. I enjoyed it... Being in institutions, I got three meals a day, clothes.
name: DMX

quote: Throughout my life, my mom has been the person that I've always looked up to.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: I pretty much look like an identical twin of my mom.
name: Odell Beckham, Jr.

quote: Because I'm an older mom, I have a responsibility to my kids as well as myself. I want to be there for them.
name: Christie Brinkley

quote: I was raised mostly by my mom.
name: Billy Crystal

quote: I started playing full-equipment football when I was 6 years old. My mom actually got me started in it.
name: Antonio Brown

quote: If I have any talent at all it's from God, and my mom, who was on Capitol Records also.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: My mom was tough.
name: Tiger Woods

quote: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.
name: Quentin Tarantino

quote: My mom's one of 13 siblings, and they all got six kids, and till I was 13 everybody was in Compton.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: I always felt like I could go to my mom and speak to her about anything. We have a great relationship.
name: Ella Mai

quote: I learned from my mom to always keep pushing yourself.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: I just grew up a poor black kid in Alabama with a single mom and two brothers.
name: Charles Barkley

quote: I know how to do anything, I'm a mom.
name: Roseanne Barr

quote: I'm very close with my family, so my mom is part of my entourage.
name: Kid Cudi

quote: Looking back, I think I was always musical. My dad was very musical, and I think my mom was musical.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: As far as I'm concerned, there's no job more important on the planet than being a mom.
name: Mark Wahlberg

quote: I've always loved playing with hair. I used to want dreads like Lauryn Hill, but my mom wouldn't let me.
name: SZA

quote: Being a mom has made me so tired. And so happy.
name: Tina Fey

quote: I'm a real stay-at-home mom. I'm really hands-on. Everything else became secondary.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: My mom put me and my sisters in the water to feel comfortable, to have water safety.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: When you have a good mother and no father, God kind of sits in. It's not enough, but it helps.
name: Dick Gregory

quote: There are only two things a child will share willingly; communicable diseases and its mother's age.
name: Benjamin Spock

quote: To the best of my knowledge, I'm the first mom to hold the job of the White House Press Secretary.
name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

quote: My mom always wanted me to be an actor. And I started going to theater and going on auditions young.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: He knows my limitations and where I'm a good wife and a good mom.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: Some of my earliest memories are dancing in the kitchen, standing on my mom's toes.
name: Ian Ziering

quote: My relationship with my mom is really the single most profound relationship that I've ever had in my life.
name: Mindy Kaling

quote: I've never once heard my mom complain about her stroke.
name: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I'm obsessed with being a mom.
name: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: I grew up listening to oldies, like Motown. That's from my mom.
name: Ryan Lochte

quote: Next to my mom, I'm actually a shrinking violet.
name: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quote: I am no mother, and I won't be one.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: I'm able to shift gears from mom to performer to mom pretty quickly.
name: Faith Hill

quote: I always wanted to be a mom.
name: Kate Hudson

quote: When I was 10 years old my mom used to play Tupac while she cleaned the house.
name: Soulja Boy

quote: My mom was always the support. I can always go out to her and she'll always find the positive in things.
name: Caroline Wozniacki

quote: I wrote a book with my mom and my sister for fun. I had no idea it would be a 'New York Times' bestseller.
name: Trisha Yearwood

quote: I love kids and children, and I love being a mom.
name: Jennie Garth

quote: Why blow money on a tour bus when you could get your mom a nice dress?
name: Brian Fallon

quote: For now I'm just enjoying being a mom. I don't want to be more famous and more rich. I want to be a good mom.
name: Jewel

quote: My mom and my dad are ebullient people, and I think I carry that with me.
name: Michael Stuhlbarg

quote: I've been blessed to have an amazing mom and two amazing sisters - so they set a very high standard.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: My mom tells me every single day that she's proud of me.
name: Don Lemon

quote: My mom and my father's birthday are on the same day.
name: Victor Cruz

quote: My parents separated when I was eight. I grew up with my mom alone.
name: Julian Casablancas

quote: My Mom always cooked healthy. Greek food lends itself to cooking healthy.
name: Cat Cora

quote: Everything I am is because of my mom.
name: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: I have five siblings, so my mom was always pregnant, and she would wear these dungarees that looked so cool.
name: Liberty Ross

quote: My mom, ever the Italian, made braised chicken with tomato.
name: Alex Guarnaschelli

quote: The only thing I've ever wanted in my life is to be a mom and a wife.
name: Missy Peregrym

quote: I want to be a fun mom. Not a gasping for air mom.
name: Mariska Hargitay

quote: My mom sent me money for a car, but the cops impounded it because I had no insurance.
name: Martin Henderson

quote: My mom was born in San Diego, around Vista. So we've always been California people.
name: Gracie Gold

quote: Statistics are to baseball what a flaky crust is to Mom's apple pie.
name: Harry Reasoner

quote: Mom always tells me to celebrate everyone's uniqueness. I like the way that sounds.
name: Hilary Duff

quote: My dad left when I was 3 1/2, and he left my mom and I.
name: David Cassidy

quote: My mom says I was born screaming.
name: Elle King

quote: I'd lose my mind if I heard my kid call the nanny Mommy.
name: Toni Braxton

quote: My mom worked tirelessly on getting equal rights for women.
name: Casey Wilson

quote: My mom always encouraged me, it was never weird. She'd look at 'Heavy Metal' and go 'Woo-hoo!'
name: Zack Snyder

quote: My mom was a free spirit, and she brought me up to be a free spirit.
name: Mark Bradford

quote: My mom put me in a Pampers commercial on TV.
name: Christian Slater

quote: My mom works in funerals, and my dad works at Burger King.
name: Kelly Marie Tran

quote: My mom gives me an allowance. She keeps me pretty tight-reined.
name: Chloe Grace Moretz

quote: My mother was predominately a stay-at-home mom.
name: Andrew Rannells

quote: I just want to be a good mom who makes her little girl proud.
name: Jamie Lynn Spears

quote: It takes bravery to be a young mom, and it does take bravery to let the world watch.
name: Jamie Lynn Spears

quote: Being a mom is really the greatest role in my life.
name: Kim Fields

quote: My mom loved the old black-and-white films.
name: Cary Fukunaga

quote: I want to be a strong, safe mom who my kids also want to be around.
name: Pamela Adlon

quote: My mom doesn't get the whole gay thing, but she loves me.
name: Jai Rodriguez

quote: I'm a really bad liar. My mom finds out every time, especially now that she's got Facebook.
name: Pixie Lott

quote: I love what I do and I think it shows. As my kids get older, they can see me as a mom who loves working.
name: Jessica Capshaw

quote: As a mom, my priorities have changed.
name: Catherine Oxenberg

quote: Of all the roles I've played, none has been as fulfilling as being a mother.
name: Annette Funicello

quote: I'm trying hard to keep my Australian accent. My mom would disown me if I didn't.
name: Maia Mitchell

quote: Being a mother is hard and it wasn't a subject I ever studied.
name: Ruby Wax

quote: I come from good stock. Both of my parents are big - my dad is a big guy; my mom is a big lady.
name: Frank Thomas

quote: I lost my mom to cancer when I was a kid.
name: Tim Van Patten

quote: My mom is just incredible. She's delved into both the mother and father figure in my life.
name: Devin Druid

quote: My mom is, like, my unofficial publicist.
name: John DeLuca

quote: I adored my mom. I thought she was the best. I loved her very much.
name: Dan Fogelman

quote: I just wasn't cut out to be a Chinese Tiger Mom. I'm more of an Irish Setter Dad.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: To be honest, I wish I had more mom friends.
name: Britney Spears

quote: When I was younger, I wouldn't speak up as much, but now that I'm a mom, things have changed.
name: Britney Spears

quote: I'm very boring. I'm a mom. I'm 34 years old.
name: Britney Spears

quote: My mom is always telling me it takes a long time to get to the top, but a short time to get to the bottom.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: I never had, like, a nanny that took care of me. My mom always fed me breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: My mom has always wished me a daughter just like me.
name: Pink

quote: My mom actually taught fifth grade, so... I'm good with fifth graders. That's, like, my specialty.
name: Zendaya

quote: I was a huge Lauryn Hill fan; that was all my mom would listen to in the car.
name: Ella Mai

quote: My mom used to play a lot of music around the house, and I think that's where I get my inspiration from.
name: Ella Mai

quote: Always it gave me a pang that my children had no lawful claim to a name.
name: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quote: I would never put myself before my mom.
name: Baker Mayfield

quote: My mom and I used to dance to the Jackson 5 in our living room.
name: Baker Mayfield

quote: A mother who is obsessing about being thin and dieting and exercising is not going to be a very good mother.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: I want to be more successful as a mother than I am in show business.
name: Celine Dion

quote: Mothers don't let your daughters grow up to be models unless you're present.
name: Janice Dickinson

quote: Mother is far too clever to understand anything she does not like.
name: Arnold Bennett

quote: I think while all mothers deal with feelings of guilt, working mothers are plagued by guilt on steroids!
name: Arianna Huffington

quote: My mom listened to the Beatles and Elvis, a lot of different types of music.
name: Travis Barker

quote: My mom died when I was 16. I had a rough childhood, you know what I mean, but it made me strong.
name: Travis Barker

quote: As a mom, I don't have much time for beauty.
name: Idina Menzel

quote: Mothers and children are human beings, and they will sometimes do the wrong thing.
name: Maurice Sendak

quote: I auditioned on my own. I tried to make a mark for myself without anybody's help, not even Mom's.
name: Kate Hudson

quote: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened.
name: Charlize Theron

quote: Motherhood is the strangest thing, it can be like being one's own Trojan horse.
name: Rebecca West

quote: Only mothers can think of the future - because they give birth to it in their children.
name: Maxim Gorky

quote: My mother taught me that we all have the power to achieve our dreams. What I lacked was the courage.
name: Clay Aiken

quote: My mom taught us the Serenity Prayer at a young age.
name: Toby Keith

quote: I guess I was a mom so late in life, my daughter was the greatest thing since sliced bread.
name: Candice Bergen

quote: What is free time? I'm a single mother. My free moments are filled with loving my little girl.
name: Roma Downey

quote: I owe much to mother. She had an expert's understanding, but also approached art emotionally.
name: David Rockefeller

quote: I want to be a cool mom.
name: Tori Spelling

quote: I always say I am a realist, and my mom says, 'No, you just have anxiety.'
name: Jessica Chastain

quote: My mother was a personal friend of God's. They had ongoing conversations.
name: Della Reese

quote: I am truly my mother's son.
name: David Geffen

quote: My mom always says, 'If you don't believe in something, you'll lose yourself completely.'
name: Hilary Duff

quote: A woman must combine the role of mother, wife and politician.
name: Emma Bonino

quote: I went to MIT. I do rocket science. Being a mom is much harder.
name: Heidi Hammel

quote: You know, I loved math. My mom was a math teacher.
name: Joan Cusack

quote: Everyone checks out my mom. My mom's hot.
name: Ashley Scott

quote: My mom was the strongest woman I know.
name: DeAngelo Williams

quote: I think about my mom every day.
name: Freddie Freeman

quote: My mom is a really good cook. We used to make dumplings together.
name: Jason Wu

quote: My mother worked in factories, worked as a domestic, worked in a restaurant, always had a second job.
name: Ed Bradley

quote: My sisters and mom raised me to respect women and open doors for them.
name: Milo Ventimiglia

quote: I'm sure that my mom would have been happy with any path I chose.
name: Joely Fisher

quote: My mom keeps me grounded and all that. She makes me do chores.
name: Auli'i Cravalho

quote: So many times, my mom would say, 'It's not too late to go law school.'
name: David Zabel

quote: I love Serge Lutens orange blossom perfume; my mom got it for me. It's my favorite. It just smells clean.
name: Gia Coppola

quote: I would borrow my mom's red Borghese lipstick and smear it on like a clown!
name: Brooke Burns

quote: My parents, especially my mother, were no influence on me whatsoever.
name: Andy Partridge

quote: My mother thinks I could have even run a larger company.
name: Christie Hefner

quote: Why do grandparents and grandchildren get along so well? The mother.
name: Claudette Colbert

quote: Mommy smoked but she didn't want us to. She saw smoke coming out of the barn one time, so we got whipped.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: When you think of couponing, you picture a mom cutting coupons out of the back of the newspaper.
name: Andrew Mason

quote: I just always wanted to be a singer. My mom said I was even singing in my cot!
name: Pixie Lott

quote: I'm a Mommy's Girl - the strongest influence in my young life was my mom.
name: Susie Bright

quote: I have an incredible role model in my mom. She was a single mother raising two kids in New York.
name: Kim Raver

quote: My father wasn't really involved and my mom is the light in my life.
name: Marion Jones

quote: If my mom reads that I'm grammatically incorrect I'll have hell to pay.
name: Larisa Oleynik
